detail.description: IIFL Finance Ltd is a diversified NBFC in India engaged in the business of loans and mortgages along with its subsidiaries. It offers a wide spectrum of products such as Home loan, Gold loan, business loan, microfinance, capital market finance and developer & construction finance, etc.[1]
